articles.author: Danny Wolstanholme
articles.title: Dave Meltzer Speculates On Why WWE Possibly Accepted A Financial Loss For Raw Netflix Deal - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: While WWE will receive billions of dollars for &#34;Raw&#34; moving to Netflix, Dave Meltzer believes that the company is taking a beneficial financial loss.
articles.content: Earlier this week, it was announced that "WWE Raw" would be moving to Netflix in January 2025, a deal reportedly worth $5 billion over 10 years. Internationally, the new agreement will see WWE's week… [+1480 chars]
